blog.name: gokunobaka
blog.title: Gokunobaka
blog.description:
Hello~! Im an illustrator/graphic artist and I work for game industry!
I've worked on Street Fighter Ultra, Tales of Zestiria, DmC Definitive Edition, Dragonball XenoVerse and much more~! 
This Is my blog where I post stuff I draw In my free time~!

summary: Playing Red Dead Redemption 2 and already finished it and now I’ve restarted playing. Probably my favorite game of all time so...
caption: Playing Red Dead Redemption 2 and already finished it and now I’ve restarted playing. Probably my favorite game of all time so of course I made a character inspired by it. This is Matthew Connor. A stable hand who was mistaken for being part of an outlaw group because they took over his farm and made him work.

reblog.comment: Playing Red Dead Redemption 2 and already finished it and now I’ve restarted playing. Probably my favorite game of all time so of course I made a character inspired by it. This is Matthew Connor. A stable hand who was mistaken for being part of an outlaw group because they took over his farm and made him work.

trail.content_raw: Playing Red Dead Redemption 2 and already finished it and now I’ve restarted playing. Probably my favorite game of all time so of course I made a character inspired by it. This is Matthew Connor. A stable hand who was mistaken for being part of an outlaw group because they took over his farm and made him work.
trail.content: Playing Red Dead Redemption 2 and already finished it and now I’ve restarted playing. Probably my favorite game of all time so of course I made a character inspired by it. This is Matthew Connor. A stable hand who was mistaken for being part of an outlaw group because they took over his farm and made him work.

summary: Art X Lagos: More Than an Art Fair, a Platform for Pan-African Creativity
title: Art X Lagos: More Than an Art Fair, a Platform for Pan-African Creativity
body: Peterside considers the international art fair a pan-African “platform” for …. “Ngozi Omeje: Connecting” is on view at the Centre for Contemporary Art Lagos. The expansive installation is Nigerian artist Ngozi Omeje’s first solo show.

reblog.comment: Peterside considers the international art fair a pan-African “platform” for …. “Ngozi Omeje: Connecting” is on view at the Centre for Contemporary Art Lagos. The expansive installation is Nigerian artist Ngozi Omeje’s first solo show.

trail.content_raw: Peterside considers the international art fair a pan-African “platform” for …. “Ngozi Omeje: Connecting” is on view at the Centre for Contemporary Art Lagos. The expansive installation is Nigerian artist Ngozi Omeje’s first solo show.
trail.content: Peterside considers the international art fair a pan-African “platform” for …. “Ngozi Omeje: Connecting” is on view at the Centre for Contemporary Art Lagos. The expansive installation is Nigerian artist Ngozi Omeje’s first solo show.

blog.name: technicalpyromania
blog.title: Certified Friend o' Frogs!
blog.description:
Howdy! The name's Emerald, and I'm just trying to be happy.
Uhh I'm a lass? It's hard to tell. I like she/her pronouns, but also I'm a fan of they/them! Oh, but you're allowed to call me amigo and dude and the like, as long as you and I are simpatico.

tags: none of you are gonna know who this obscure sad chameleon lad is so i won't tag it? also he's irrecognizable
so this was the cleanest sketch i had onhand
i took a pic on my awful camera and cleaned up the lines a bit
did some simple colors and boom. chameleon man.
not bad. not superb but not bad
summary: Usually on my digital art, I try harder to make sure that my lines are clean(ish), but, let’s face it. No matter how much i try,...
caption:
Usually on my digital art, I try harder to make sure that my lines are clean(ish), but, let’s face it. No matter how much i try, drawing on my trackpad just isn’t gonna work.
So I tried something else. Honestly? I don’t hate it, this time.

reblog.comment:
Usually on my digital art, I try harder to make sure that my lines are clean(ish), but, let’s face it. No matter how much i try, drawing on my trackpad just isn’t gonna work.
So I tried something else. Honestly? I don’t hate it, this time.

trail.content_raw:
Usually on my digital art, I try harder to make sure that my lines are clean(ish), but, let’s face it. No matter how much i try, drawing on my trackpad just isn’t gonna work.
So I tried something else. Honestly? I don’t hate it, this time.
trail.content:
Usually on my digital art, I try harder to make sure that my lines are clean(ish), but, let’s face it. No matter how much i try, drawing on my trackpad just isn’t gonna work.
So I tried something else. Honestly? I don’t hate it, this time.
